attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: For his dedication in creating Ross Kemp on gangs and Ross Kemp in Afghanistan, he has allowed the rest of the world to really see what goes on in these parts of the world. For this bravery and devotion Ross Kemp should be rewarded with a Knighthood.

rejection.details: The Cabinet Office is actively seeking nominations for honours from the public. Please go to http://www.honours.gov.uk/
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
